ValidationRule.description: Exemption defaults to zero. Account Lost defaults to Published rate.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack', NOT(ISCHANGED( Status__c )), OR( ISCHANGED( Confirmed_Date__c ), ISCHANGED( Confirmed_Rate__c ), ISCHANGED( Conclusion_Date__c) ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Account Lost'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Exemption') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Rates and Dates of 'Account Lost' or 'Exemption' Statuses
